title: I forgot my username
body: **I forgot my username and i don't know my email so can i check whats the username's logged on my pc somewhere in lol files?**

replies.body: Since you can't use the Forgot Username function, reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They won't be able to simply tell you your username, but after verifying yourself as the original creator they can work with you to get you access to the account again.
**btw this is not my account i use it to post this**
